Posts.EditableText:
what is the code for altering an objects prefix or suffix?
i can change the name of an item in game but not sure of how to do this....(sound of drumming on a keyboard)
Posts.HTML:
what is the code for altering an objects prefix or suffix?
i can change the name of an item in game but not sure of how to do this....(sound of drumming on a keyboard)

Posts.EditableText:
Just change the prefix or suffix property, using the "set a variable or attribute" command:

[code:aajhlj46]
myobject.prefix = "My new prefix"
[/code:aajhlj46]
Posts.HTML:
Just change the prefix or suffix property, using the "set a variable or attribute" command:


myobject.prefix = "My new prefix"

Posts.EditableText: thanks. now i could swear i did that yesterday. ill blame on the coffee - or lack of:)
